# 右侧操作菜单展示

喜剧
动作
爱情
<template>
    <div>
        <MantTree
            :data="treeData"
        >
            <template slot-scope="{item}">
                <MantButton @click="onClick(item)">操作</MantButton>
            </template>
        </MantTree>
    </div>
</template>
<script>
export default {
    data() {
        return {
            treeData: [
                {
                    id: "1",
                    title: "喜剧",
                    children: [
                        {
                            id: "1-1",
